Name: Maurine
description:
Maurine is 25 years old and is a happy woman. She lives in the Kaplong, Litein area of Kenya. Her family is the greatest thing in her life and something that makes her feel accomplished in life.

Although she has only farmed for the past five years, she is working hard and learning good farming practices. Although she has faced many obstacles, that has not been a setback because Maurine has been making great profits in farming.

Kaplong is one of the places that has favorable conditions that favor horticulture farming, that is good climate, soil, transport system and market.

Maurine has always wanted to diversify and start horticulture farming, but the biggest challenge she has been facing is a lack of funds to start the business off the ground.

She is requesting a loan to buy seeds and start horticulture farming. Through Juhudi Kilimo, she will be able to secure a loan.

With your loan, she intends to buy good quality vegetable seeds, flowers and potatoes. This loan will improve her living conditions and secure the future of her children.

You can help Maurine to accomplish all these dreams with a loan, so do it now and get her closer to her goals.
